item.title: Azure DevOps: delete all unstable version of packages in feeds
item.description: Azure DevOps has a dedicated section for artifacts that allows you to store NuGet, NPM feeds, and more. Thanks to its integration with pipelines, very often, automatic pipelines are generated that publish packages with every commit in the repository. This way, we have the opportunity to have all versions for all dev branches. This approach is needed because the usual flow when you develop a new feature in a package is the following:
